amendment.description: To provide funds for 12 additional Weapons of Mass Destruction Civil Support Teams.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1232 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1232 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S9361; text: CR S9361) To provide funds for 12 additional Weapons of Mass Destruction Civil Support Teams.
